00060   // but before any other event handling (including dialogs or splash screens) occurs.
00061   // If an OpenDocuments event has been created before the application was launched,
00062   // it must be handled before some other event handler runs and dismisses it as unknown.
00063   // If run at startup, the handler will set either or both of myProjectFileName and myFileList.

00069   if (QFile::exists(bundledQtCore))
00070   {
00071     QCoreApplication::setLibraryPaths(QStringList(QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()));

00104 /* Test to determine if this program was started on Mac OS X by double-clicking
00105  * the application bundle rather then from a command line. If clicked, argv[1]
00106  * contains a process serial number in the form -psn_0_1234567. Don't process
00107  * the command line arguments in this case because argv[1] confuses the processing.
00108  */
00109 bool bundleclicked(int argc, char *argv[])
00110 {
00111   return ( argc > 1 && memcmp(argv[1], "-psn_", 5) == 0 );
00112 }
